name: @douglassllc/mp4box-static
description: MP4Box static binaries for Mac OSX, Linux, and Windows

scripts.cleanup: rm -rf build/darwin-x64-* build/linux-* build/win32-*; rm bin/darwin/x64/*; rm bin/linux/ia32/*; rm bin/linux/x64/*; rm bin/win32/ia32/*; rm bin/win32/x64/*; rm -rf bin/darwin/x64/*
